text: Thodu Dongalu or Todu Dongalu may refer to: * Thodu Dongalu (1954 film), a 1954 Telugu film directed by D. Yoganand starring N. T. Rama Rao * Thodu Dongalu (1981 film), a 1981 Telugu film directed by K. Vasu starring Krishna Ghattamaneni and Chiranjeevi * Thodu Dongalu (1993 film)
title: Thodu Dongalu
